hero.name: Célia Haro
hero.location: Based near Nantes – Available to collaborate on your web projects

about.title: About
about.text1: The web and computer science have always sparked my curiosity. In March 2024, I decided to turn interest into action by joining the Web Integrator program at OpenClassrooms.
about.text2: This journey takes place as a work-study at [Company Name], which allows me to combine theoretical learning with hands-on practice: creating interfaces, optimizing user experiences, understanding client needs, and developing tailored solutions.
about.text3: Every new project is an opportunity to learn, experiment, and push my limits. Curious and detail-oriented, I put my energy and attention to detail into delivering web solutions that are both effective and engaging.

items.name: Booki
items.description: Responsive integration of a travel agency website based on a Figma mockup.

items.name: Ohmyfood
items.description: Improved the mobile interface of a restaurant website with CSS animations.

items.name: Portfolio Sophie Bluel
items.description: Built a dynamic web page with content management via API.

items.name: Kasa
items.description: Real estate rental web application, front-end feature development.

items.name: Nina Carducci
items.description: Optimized SEO and accessibility for a photographer's website.

items.name: 724 Events
items.description: Debugging and improvements for an event agency's website.

items.name: Argent Bank
items.description: Implemented the front-end of a banking application and managed state with Redux.

items.name: Corporate Website (confidential client)
items.description: Responsive adaptation, feature development, and bug fixing in a complex codebase. Strengthened debugging skills and worked directly with the client, gaining a concrete view of real-world requirements.

items.name: Data Scraping Projects
items.description: Automated extraction and processing of data from multiple websites, with export to JSON and CSV to facilitate analysis and use of the information.
